title: Lelystad Airport (EHLE) updated in MSFS
description:
In this video we look at the updated Lelystad Airport (EHLE) which is the busiest General Avaition airport in the Netherlands. The airport was established over 50 years ago, it handles around 80,000 aircraft movements annually. The airport offers a variety of aviation activities, including flight training, sport flying, business aviation, and sightseeing flights. Lelystad Airport is also preparing to become a new hub for holiday travelers, aiming to reduce congestion at Schiphol Airport. The airport is known for its sustainability initiatives and strong community involvement.

This update will update the airport to the next level in MSFS adding so much details including the terminal which is not in use "yet".

For a full overview of items added to the marketplace this week have a look at the video below:
https://youtu.be/UcOoP-Y0RG0
